channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Poison at Play: Unsafe Levels of Lead Found in Half of New Orleans Playgrounds
item.description: Verite News’ reporters tested soil in more than 80 playgrounds for lead contamination. Even in trace amounts, lead exposure in children can result in ...

item.title: They help police with mental health calls. So why are 'mobile crisis' teams in crisis?
item.description: Interactions between police and someone in psychiatric crisis can end in violence. Communities have been sending mental health professionals instead, ...

item.title: Scientists say this brain network may explain range of Parkinson's symptoms
item.description: Parkinson's disease can affect sleep, thinking and smell, as well as movement. A new study may explain why.

item.title: Measles outbreak in South Carolina continues but may be slowing
item.description: South Carolina released the newest numbers on its measles outbreak, and there's news of other cases around the country.

item.title: When the Doctor Needs a Checkup
item.description: The physician workforce is aging fast, and some hospitals now require that older clinicians undergo testing for cognitive decline. Many have resisted.

item.description: The "KFF Health News Minute” brings original health care and health policy reporting from our newsroom to the airwaves each week.
